name: Harrow Conjuring Glyph
description: What you conjure, Harrow will bind.

languages.description: Was du beschwörst, wird Harrow binden.
languages.name: Glyphe: Harrow Beschwörung

languages.description: Ce que vous invoquez, Harrow le liera.
languages.name: Glyphe Harrow Invocation

languages.description: Ciò che evochi, Harrow lo legherà.
languages.name: Glifo Harrow Evocazione

languages.description: 당신이 무엇을 불러내든, 해로우가 묶어 놓을 것입니다.
languages.name: 해로우 컨저링 글리프

languages.description: Lo que conjures, Harrow lo atará.
languages.name: Glifo de Harrow Conjuro

languages.description: 你所召唤的，Harrow 都会将其束缚。
languages.name: Harrow 招魂浮印

languages.description: 何を解き放とうと、Harrowはそれを縛る。
languages.name: Harrow Conjuring グリフ

languages.description: To, co ty wyczarujesz, Harrow zwiąże.
languages.name: Glif Zaklinającego Harrowa

languages.description: Seja lá o que você conjurar, o Harrow acorrentará.
languages.name: Glifo: Conjuração do Harrow

languages.description: 你可以召喚出來的，Harrow 都可以束縛。
languages.name: Harrow 喚術浮印

languages.description: ไม่ว่าคุณจะปลุกอะไรออกมา Harrow จะผูกมัดไว้เอง
languages.name: ภาพสัญลักษณ์ Harrow Conjuring

languages.description: Що ви заклинатимете, то Гарроу прив’язуватиме.
languages.name: Гліф «Гарроу-заклинач»
